body_html:
I have the same problem when I use summary.merge for variables which were created with while_loop

tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: The node 'Merge/MergeSummary' has inputs from different frames. The input 'tower_0/while/o_rnn_3/kern/HistogramSummary_1' is in frame 'tower_0/while/tower_0/while/'. The input 'g_embatch_size/emb_x_0' is in frame ''

body:
I have the same problem when I use `summary.merge` for variables which were created with `while_loop `

tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: The node 'Merge/MergeSummary' has inputs from different frames. The input 'tower_0/while/o_rnn_3/kern/HistogramSummary_1' is in frame 'tower_0/while/tower_0/while/'. The input 'g_embatch_size/emb_x_0' is in frame ''
